definitions.text: an imperfection in a bodily system
examples: this device permits detection of defects in the lungs
that interpretation is an unfortunate defect of our lack of information

definitions.text: an imperfection in an object or machine
examples: a flaw caused the crystal to shatter
if there are any defects you should send it back to the manufacturer

definitions.text: a mark or flaw that spoils the appearance of something (especially on a person's body)
desert (a cause, a country or an army), often in order to join the opposing cause, country, or army
examples: If soldiers deserted Hitler's army, they were shot
